text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's Rice Shower! Rice Shower did not back down! An excellent finish 
in first!

With the Tenno Sho right around the corner, Rice runs like her old 
self again at the Nikkei Sho.

And as if galvanized by that performance, McQueen takes the Osaka 
Hai in course-record time.

They've both been training harder than ever, pushing each other to 
greater heights.
And before long, the day of the Tenno Sho arrives.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In bracket two, post three, it's the sable stayer who denied Mihono 
Bourbon her Triple Crown—Rice Shower!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just follow McQueen… Just keep following…

Unfazed by the huge crowd before her, Rice fixes her gaze on 
McQueen.

She wants to win against her rival more than anything else. Her eyes 
are telling me so.
Meanwhile, the crowd favorite is, of course…

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In bracket eight, post fourteen, today's favorite with a third straight 
spring Tenno Sho on the line, it's the queen herself—Mejiro 
McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

The loudest fanfare of the day resounds for her, but McQueen 
doesn't seem to hear.

Like her rival, she's focused on one thing, and one thing 
only—victory.
The crowd's excited to see you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. Shouldn't you be going to check up on Rice?
I'm your trainer too, you know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Heh. And I'm lucky to have such an exemplary one. But please, go see 
how she's doing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
After all that training, I'm sure she's built up enough confidence, but 
she must still be feeling anxious.
I'm lucky to have such an exemplary ace on my team. Always looking out for others, even a rival.
I'm lucky to have such an exemplary ace on my team. Always looking out for others, even a rival.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For now, yes. Out on the turf, I can't make any guarantees.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will put everything I have into this race. No holding back.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The crowd are hoping to witness the birth of a three-time Tenno Sho 
champion. And their hopes give me strength.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will be the first to cross that finish line.

I can't detect a single trace of hesitation in her eyes. She means every 
word.
choice_data_list: Well, you can add my hopes in there as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course. I won't disappoint.
After speaking with McQueen, I jog ahead to Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer…

Nervous? The trick is to write "Umamusume" on your palm and swallow 
the word three times.

Nervous? The trick is to write "Umamusume" on your palm and swallow 
the word three times.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heheheh. I've never heard that before.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm not that nervous, actually. It's just… I'm a bit scared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So many people are rooting for McQueen. I know how much they 
want to see her third Tenno Sho win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
If I win, they'll all be disappointed. They'll be angry with me for 
getting in the way.
The fact you're worried about that tells me you're here to win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. I still want to win.
Her expression reminds me of McQueen just now. Pure determination.

You know, it was McQueen who suggested I have you race in the 
Tenno Sho.

You know, it was McQueen who suggested I have you race in the 
Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen?

Apparently, she wants to show you something—a sight only a fellow 
runner can see.

Apparently, she wants to show you something—a sight only a fellow 
runner can see.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: There's a… "sight" she wants me to see?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Okay. I'll see it for myself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mm. I will, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're lining up in the gate. The spring Tenno Sho—who will the 
glory go to?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Just follow McQueen… Keep following… Just follow McQueen… Keep 
following…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: (Well I'll be… Wasn't expecting to feel so much pressure from Rice.)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and here's the favorite, three-time hopeful Mejiro McQueen 
showing hesitation before the gate.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
(Still, I am a Mejiro, and our team's ace. I must run with everything I 
have.)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: There we go, Mejiro McQueen is in the gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The spring Tenno Sho. Glory is 3,200 meters away. And… they're off!
